reviewText: Great entertainment for my four year old.  I think it is sooooo weird, but he seems to love it.  He also enjoys playing with his beyblades after watching.

I got this series for my son when he was 5 & Beyblades were all the rage at his school. He watched the series over & over again. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 cuz it sounds kind of like they're always yelling but I think it must have been in  Japanese originally & when translated to English they had to talk fast as we have more words (kind of like Speedracer back in my day).
My son loves this series and this was shipped fast. No issues with quality. Great distraction for when you are traveling

My sons love this DVD, and watch it often, though I personally don't understand what's so exciting about spinning tops.

French is available as a language choice(which I thought would be useful for them as they are currently learning the language). However, there are no subtitles, hence that part didn't work!!!
Bought this for my 5 year old who loves to play beyblades. He loves this video and watches it over and over.
I love beyblade, so this is fun
Everything thing looks great! Came in quickly, case was in perfect condition.
My son is very into beyblades, enjoys this cartoon a lot!
Nice packaging.  No problems with the product.  Kids are happy with it, what more can I ask for? Now I need to find more like it for the.
Each and every bey is a delight. They are all fun to play with and battle other players. Each bey is great.
love this show got the moves for my kid they all play grate and have a nice pic arte work on cover is nice to

The Metal Fusion is a good quality cartoon with a good message. Volume 2 is great too.
We will be ordering Volume 3 and 4.
Much better than the "Let it Rip" bey blade cartoon.
My grandson is a huge fan and will watch the movie over and over. I believe he knows the lines word for word.
